actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 2159 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2159 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 2158. (consideration: CR S14478-14479) To permit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to register a Canadian pesticide.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2159 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 2158.

amends_amendment.purpose: To provide for the enhanced review of covered pesticide products, to authorize fees for certain pesticide products, and to extend and improve the collection of maintenance fees.

purpose: To permit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to register a Canadian pesticide.
